extends Object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<Template> findAll(Site site)
      Returns a cached list of all templates in the given site.
      static Template findRenderable(Object object, Site site)
      Finds the template that should be used to render the given object in the given site.
      static List<Template> findUsable(Object object)
      Finds a list of all templates that are usable with the given object.
      static List<com.psddev.dari.db.ObjectType> findUsedTypes(Site site)
      Finds a cached list of all types that are used by any of the templates in the given site.
